mapper.select: SELECT u.id as userId, u.nickname as nickname, u.role_id as roleId, r.role_name as roleName, p.menu_code as menuCode, p.permission_code as permissionCode FROM sys_user as u LEFT JOIN sys_role as r ON r.id = u.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_role_permission as rp ON u.role_id = rp.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_permission as p ON rp.permission_id = p.id AND rp.delete_status = '1' WHERE u.username = #{username} AND u.delete_status = '1'
SELECT p.permission_code as permissionCode FROM sys_permission as p ORDER BY p.id
SELECT p.menu_code as menuCode FROM sys_permission as p ORDER BY p.id
